title: C&C Generals Zero Hour FULL DFmod Easyinstall
description:
C&C Generals:Zero Hour Full version incl. Destructive Forces mod V1.3 + 25 professional maps


INFORMATION: 
This package contains the Full retail version of Zero Hour, patched to latest version 
and cracked. It's ready to run Out-of-the-box after a quick and easy install.

This version also has Destructive Forces V1.3 (a great mod) preinstalled.
If you want to play the original Zero Hour instead of the mod, just remove the file
"DestructiveForcesV1.3a.big" from the Zero Hour root directory. 

This Version also contains an extra 25 professional skirmishmaps and an optional 
additional 10 LAN-maps.

Generals was stipped to minimize the size of this package. Zero Hour is so much better 
than Generals, so there's no reason anyone wanna play that one anyways :P.
The files for Generals that are included in this package are needed for Zero Hour to function.

If you want to via LAN or Internet please check the "LAN-stuff" archive.

INSTALLATION: 
1) Just run the "FullZH_DFinstall.exe"
2) Play the game

Uninstallation: 
1) Just run the uninstaller

System Requirements: 
* The better hardware the better the game will run
* 3GB free HDD space
